## ExtendedStylesInjectOptions.moduleType property

Generated code modules type. Options: - 'esm' - ecmascript 6 modules - 'cjs' - commonjs

Default 'esm'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moduleType?: 'esm' | 'cjs';
```
